```{r}

# library(tidyverse)
# library(SimcypConsultancy)
library(flextable)
library(officer)

flextable_simcyp <- function(DF){

   DF %>% flextable() %>% 
      bold(part = "header") %>%
      bold(j = 1, part = "body") %>% 
      align(align = "center", part = "header") %>%
      border_remove() %>% 
      border_inner_v(part = "all", border = fp_border(width = 0.5)) %>% 
   border_outer(border = fp_border(width = 0.5)) %>% 
   set_table_properties(width = 1, layout = "autofit")

}

```

```{r}

if("File" %in% names(MyPKResults)){
    MyPKResults <- MyPKResults %>% 
        select(!matches("File"), File)
}

flextable_simcyp(MyPKResults)

```
